meaning: association, braid, plait, construct, assemble, unite, cooperate, grapple

onyomiExamples.meaning: organization, organisation, formation, structure, construction, setup, constitution, system (e.g. railroad, transport, party, etc.), tissue, texture (of a rock), weave (of a fabric)
labor union, labour union, trade union

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to cross (legs or arms), to link (arms), to put together, to construct, to assemble, to produce (e.g. TV program), to braid, to plait, to grapple, to wrestle, to unite, to join, to link up, to form an alliance, to set (e.g. type), to issue (e.g. money order)
set (of items), group (of people), class (of students), company (esp. construction), family (i.e. mafia), team, typesetting, composition
labor union, labour union, trade union
group of death, tournament group containing many strong teams
